import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
@WebServlet("/Lab2ProServlet")
public class Lab2ProServlet extends HttpServlet {
 private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
    public Lab2ProServlet() {
        super();
        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    }
 protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws
ServletException, IOException {
  // TODO Auto-generated method stub
   
  PrintWriter out = response.getWriter();
  String username=request.getParameter("txt");
  String password=request.getParameter("pass");
  if((username.equals("mca"))& (password.equals("mca")))
  {
   out.println("Welcome to the Computer Science [PG] Department");
   response.setStatus(HttpServletResponse.SC_OK);
   out.println("<br>");
   out.println("Status Code 200");
  }
  else
  {
   out.println("Client request incomplete Status Code 404");
   response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND,"page not found");
  }
 }
}

client side:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="ISO-8859-1">
</head>
<body>
<form action="http://localhost:8282/Lab2ProServlet/Lab2ProServlet" method="post">
Username: <input type="text" name="txt"><br>
Password: <input type="password" name="pass"><br>
<input type="submit" name="submit"><br>
<input type="reset" name="reset">
</form>
</body>
</html>
